channel.title: Henk Verlinde on Doks
channel.description: Recent content in Henk Verlinde on Doks

item.title: Doks 1.6
item.description: Doks 1.6 is out! This release includes a new Hugo requirement, an improved scripts setup, new development tools, and more.

item.title: Doks 1.4
item.description: Doks 1.4 is now available! This release includes a new shortcode for link cards, improved sidebar navigation, and more.

item.title: Doks 1.3
item.description: Doks 1.3 — our first release of the new year — is here! This release includes restructured dependencies, deduplicated Bootstrap variables, and more.

item.title: Doks 1.2
item.description: Doks 1.2 is out! This release features support for diagrams, extended code blocks formatting, and more.

item.title: Doks 1.0
item.description: Doks 1.0 is here! This release is a restructure release, making Doks more robust, reliable, and flexible.
